show_jump_to_related_searches_btn_label_.message: Show jump to related searches/pagination buttons

show_page_indicator_label_text.message: Show total total number of loaded pages/current page indicator

scroll_to_top_title.message:
Left-click to go to top.

Right-click to go to bottom.

When you go to top or bottom Google Enhancement Suite remembers your position. To return to this position middle-click.

You can also remember your position without going to top or bottom. To do this, middle-click, if Google Enhancement Suite doesn't have a position remembered, or click and hold middle button for 0.35 second if it does.

jump_to_related_searches_title.message: Click to jump to related searches/pagination buttons. Click again to return to the previous position.
